items.title: 1. Welcome to the Explore area
items.content: Start here to explore, analyse and share data.

items.title: 2. Preferences
items.content: Set your home location to filter content according to your interest.

items.title: 3. Map
items.content: View locations where we are collecting data.

items.title: 4. Reports
items.content: Browse reports that have been published from the work area.

items.title: 5. Documents
items.content: Search for other key documents and reference materials.

items.title: 6. Data
items.content: Browse data that has been published from various sources.
